c74object.name: fl.medianfilter~
c74object.digest: Applies a median or other specified percentiled filter to the input.
c74object.description: The default percentile is 50% which returns the median. The output is the same length as the input. Each output value is the specified percentile of the surrouding area in the input. The width of the filtering and the edge behaviour are both controllable.

entry.name: /width [int]
entry.description: Sets the width of the filtering in samples.

entry.name: /edges [enum]
entry.description:
Sets the edge behaviour for filtering:
pad - values beyond the edges of the input are read as the padding value.
extend - the edge values are extended infinitely in either direction.
wrap - values are read as wrapped or cyclical.
fold - values are folded at edges without repetition of the edge values.
mirror - values are mirrored at edges with the edge values repeated.
[0] - pad [1] - extend [2] - wrap [3] - fold [4] - mirror

objarg.name: width
objarg.digest: Sets the width of the filtering in samples
objarg.description: Sets the width of the filtering in samples.

objarg.name: edges
objarg.digest: Sets the edge behaviour for filtering
objarg.description:
Sets the edge behaviour for filtering:
pad - values beyond the edges of the input are read as the padding value.
extend - the edge values are extended infinitely in either direction.
wrap - values are read as wrapped or cyclical.
fold - values are folded at edges without repetition of the edge values.
mirror - values are mirrored at edges with the edge values repeated.

method.name: frame
method.description: Used internally by FrameLib connection routines. User messages have no effect

method.name: sync
method.description: Used internally by FrameLib connection routines. User messages have no effect

attribute.name: rt
attribute.description: Sets the realtime state for this object

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Sets the context name for this object
